release.action: Added support for using third-party plugins
Added support for specifying Visitors to include and exclude
Added Findbugs version to report header
Added suppression of FindBugs System.out output.
adds support for effort parameter (min,default,max) and showing it in the report
adds support for specifying include and exclude filter file
changes report name to "FindBugs Report", was previously "Maven FindBugs Report"
fixes line number column: "5-5" changed to "5". "-1" changed to "Not available"
adds a new details column with long description name that also links to findbugs official site for descriptions
Added a hyperlink in the report pointing to the source generated by the maven-jxr-plugin. The link to the javadoc was not implemented. Enable/Disable of the plugin was not implemented.
Added the auxiliary classpath from the pom to the findbugs configuration.
Added dependency to saxpath - needed by jaxen.
